languages.text: "{name} фон Валанциус, пред трибуналом, Лорд-инквизитором и самим Богом-Императором, отвечайте: вы признаете, что {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}состояли в общем сговоре с Леди Теодорой и одним из кабалов темных эльдаров{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: "{name} фон Валанциус, пред трибуналом, Лорд-инквизитором и самим Богом-Императором, отвечайте: вы признаете, что состояли в общем сговоре с Леди Теодорой и одним из кабалов темных эльдар?"

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals{/d}?"
languages.original_text: "{name} фон Валанциус, пред трибуналом, Лорд-инквизитором и самим Богом-Императором, отвечайте: вы признаете, что {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}состояли в общем сговоре с Леди Теодорой и одним из кабалов темных эльдаров{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before Lord Inquisitor and before God-Emperor himself: do you admit to conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals?"
"{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before Lord Inquisitor and before God-Emperor himself: do you admit to conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals?"
"{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before Lord Inquisitor, and before God-Emperor himself. Do you admit to conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Dark Ones' Kabals?"
"{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before Lord Inquisitor, and before God-Emperor himself. Do you admit to conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Dark Ones' Kabals?"

"{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Dark Aeldari Kabals?"

"{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals{/d}?"

"{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals{/d}?"

languages.text: « {name} von Valancius, parlez en toute franchise devant la cour, devant le seigneur inquisiteur et devant l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. Reconnaissez-vous avoir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiré avec dame Théodora et l'une des Kabales drukharis{/d} ? »
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: « {name} von Valancius, parlez en toute franchise devant la cour, devant le seigneur inquisiteur et devant l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. Reconnaissez-vous avoir conspiré avec dame Théodora et l'une des Kabales ténébreuses ? »

languages.text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，在神圣的法庭，在大审判官大人面前，在神皇本人面前，以诚实的态度开口吧。你是否承认，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}你、西奥多拉夫人与黑暗灵族的阴谋团沆瀣一气{/d}？”
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，在神圣的法庭，在审判长大人面前，在神皇本人面前，以诚实的态度开口吧。你是否承认，你、西奥多拉夫人与黑暗灵族的阴谋团沆瀣一气？”

languages.text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスよ。本法廷の前で、ロード・インクィジターの前で、そして神帝陛下の御前で、正直に話しなさい。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}シオドーラ卿ならびにデュカーリの陰謀団{/d}の一人と共謀したことを認めるか？」
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスよ。本法廷の前で、ロード・インクィジターの前で、そして神帝陛下の御前で、正直に話しなさい。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}シオドーラ卿ならびにデュカーリの陰謀団{/d}の一人と共謀したことを認めるか？」

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius, sprecht die Wahrheit vor dem Hof, vor dem Großinquisitor und vor dem Gottimperator selbst. Gesteht Ihr, dass Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}Euch mit Lady Theodora und einer der Kabalen der Drukhari verschworen habt{/d}?"
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius, sprecht die Wahrheit vor dem Hof, vor dem Großinquisitor und vor dem Gottimperator selbst. Gesteht Ihr, dass Ihr Euch mit Lady Theodora und einer der Kabalen der Dunklen verschworen habt?"

"{name} von Valancius, sprecht die Wahrheit vor dem Hof, vor dem Großinquisitor und vor dem Gottimperator selbst. Gesteht Ihr, dass Ihr Euch mit Lady Theodora und einer der Kabalen der Drukhari verschworen habt?"

languages.text: «{name} von Valancius, hable con sinceridad ante el tribunal, ante el Lord Inquisidor y ante el mismísimo Dios Emperador. ¿Admite {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}haber conspirado con lady Theodora y con una de las Kábalas de los Drukhari?{/d}».
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: «{name} von Valancius, hable con sinceridad ante el tribunal, ante el Lord Inquisidor y ante el mismísimo Dios Emperador. ¿Admite haber conspirado con lady Theodora y con una de las kábalas de los Oscuros?».

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius; divan, Lord Engizisyoncu ve Tanrı İmparator Hazretleri'nin önünde doğruyu söyle. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}Leydi Theodora ve bir Drukhari Kabalı ile komplo kurduğunu{/d} itiraf ediyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, speak truthfully before the court, before the Lord Inquisitor, and before the God-Emperor Himself. Do you admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}conspiring with Lady Theodora and one of the Drukhari Kabals{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius, divan önünde, Lord Engizisyoncu önünde ve Tanrı İmparator'un bizzat kendisinin önünde doğruyu söyle. Leydi Theodora ve Drukhari Kaballarının biri ile komplo kurduğunu itiraf ediyor musun?"
